Interface SupervisedFilter

All Known Implementing Classes:
AttributeSelection, ClassOrder, Discretize, NominalToBinary, PLSFilter, Resample, SMOTE, SpreadSubsample, StratifiedRemoveFolds
public interface SupervisedFilter

Interface for filters that make use of a class attribute.
